languages.text: "О-о-о, святая грамота! Мое благословение и проклятие. Я расспрашивала каждого благородного, кто захаживал в наши карьерные корпуса по своим благородным делам. Читала штампы на складских ящиках и печати на дверях, подсматривала, как командиры заполняют бланки и сама вызывалась им в помощь... Так и обучилась потихоньку. Ну а потом грамота стала моим счастливым билетом в безбедную жизнь!" {n}Джай приосанивается, явно довольная собой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "О-о-о, святая грамота! Мое благословение и проклятие. Я расспрашивала каждого благородного, кто захаживал в наши карьерные корпуса по своим благородным делам. Читала штампы на складских ящиках и печати на дверях, подсматривала, как командиры заполняют бланки и сама вызывалась им в помощь... Так и обучилась потихоньку. Ну а потом грамота стала моим счастливым билетом в безбедную жизнь!" {n}Джай приосанивается, явно довольная собой.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ah, literacy! My blessing and my curse. I nagged every highborn who visited our barracks on their highborn business. I pored over stamps on crates in the warehouse and the seals on every door, watched the commanders do paperwork and volunteered to help... That's how I learned, one step at a time. And then literacy became my ticket to a comfortable life!" {n}Jae sets back her shoulders, obviously very proud of herself.{/n}

Ну а потом грамота стала моим счастливым билетом в безбедную жизнь!" {n}Джай приосанивается, явно довольная собой.{/n}

And then literacy became my ticket to a comfortable life!" {n}Jae sets back her shoulders, obviously very proud of herself.{/n}

languages.text: “啊，读书写字！我的祝福，我的诅咒。只要有贵族来我们的军营里做生意，我就会缠着他们叨叨个不停。我仔细研究仓库里板条箱上的印章，以及每扇门上的封条。我旁观指挥官做文书工作，自愿帮忙……这就是我的学习方式，一步一个脚印。在那之后，识字的能力就成了我通往舒适生活的门票！”{n}婕伊向后甩着肩膀，显然非常自豪。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah, literacy! My blessing and my curse. I nagged every highborn who visited our barracks on their highborn business. I pored over stamps on crates in the warehouse and the seals on every door, watched the commanders do paperwork and volunteered to help... That's how I learned, one step at a time. And then literacy became my ticket to a comfortable life!" {n}Jae sets back her shoulders, obviously very proud of herself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “啊，读书写字！我的祝福，我的诅咒。只要有贵族来我们的军营里做生意，我就会缠着他们叨叨个不停。我仔细研究仓库里板条箱上的印章，以及每扇门上的封条。我旁观指挥官做文书工作，自愿帮忙……这就是我的学习方式，一步一个脚印。在那之后，识字的能力就成了我通往舒适生活的门票！”{n}婕伊向后甩着肩膀，显然非常自豪。{/n}

languages.original_text: "Ah, literacy! My blessing and my curse. I nagged every highborn who visited our barracks on their highborn business. I pored over the stamps on crates in the warehouse and the seals on every door, watched the commanders do paperwork and volunteered to help... That's how I learned, one step at a time. And then literacy became my ticket to a comfortable life!" {n}Jae sets back her shoulders, obviously very proud of herself.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Ah, la alfabetización! Mi bendición y mi maldición. Insistí a todos los nobles que visitaron nuestro barracón para sus asuntos políticos. Estudié los sellos de las cajas del almacén y las indicaciones de cada puerta, observé a los comandantes mientras hacían su papeleo y me ofrecí a ayudar... así es como aprendí, pasito a pasito. ¡Y luego ese conocimiento fue mi pase a la buena vida!». {n}Jae saca pecho, claramente orgullosa de sus logros.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah, literacy! My blessing and my curse. I nagged every highborn who visited our barracks on their highborn business. I pored over stamps on crates in the warehouse and the seals on every door, watched the commanders do paperwork and volunteered to help... That's how I learned, one step at a time. And then literacy became my ticket to a comfortable life!" {n}Jae sets back her shoulders, obviously very proud of herself.{/n}

Estudié los sellos de las cajas del almacén y las indicaciones de cada puerta, observé a los comandantes mientras hacían su papeleo y me ofrecí a ayudar... así es como aprendí, pasito a pasito. ¡Y luego ese conocimiento fue mi pase a la buena vida!». {n}Jae saca pecho, claramente orgullosa de sus logros.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「ああ、読み書きの能力！あたしの祝福にして呪いさ。あたしは、用事で兵舎を訪れるハイボーンたちに口うるさく声をかけたんだ。それから、倉庫の木箱に押されたスタンプやドアのシールに目を通し、司令官たちが書類仕事をするのを見守り、自ら進んで手伝った…そうやって一歩ずつ学んでいった。そして、読み書きが快適な生活への切符となったのよ！」{n}ジェイは背筋を伸ばし、明らかに誇らしげだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah, literacy! My blessing and my curse. I nagged every highborn who visited our barracks on their highborn business. I pored over stamps on crates in the warehouse and the seals on every door, watched the commanders do paperwork and volunteered to help... That's how I learned, one step at a time. And then literacy became my ticket to a comfortable life!" {n}Jae sets back her shoulders, obviously very proud of herself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、読み書きの能力！あたしの祝福にして呪いさ。あたしは、用事で兵舎を訪れるハイボーンたちに口うるさく声をかけたんだ。それから、倉庫の木箱に押されたスタンプやドアのシールに目を通し、司令官たちが書類仕事をするのを見守り、自ら進んで手伝った…そうやって一歩ずつ学んでいった。そして、読み書きが快適な生活への切符となったのよ！」{n}ジェイは背筋を伸ばし、明らかに誇らしげだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ah, Lesen! Mein Segen und mein Fluch. Ich habe jeden Hochgeborenen belästigt, der für seine Hochgeborenen-Angelegenheiten in unsere Kaserne gekommen ist. Ich habe über den Stempeln auf Kisten im Lagerhaus gebrütet und den Siegeln auf sämtlichen Türen, habe den Commandern bei ihrem Papierkram zugesehen und angeboten, zu helfen ... So habe ich es gelernt, Schritt für Schritt. Und dann wurde das Lesen mein Ticket zu einem komfortablen Leben!" {n}Jae richtet sich stolz auf.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah, literacy! My blessing and my curse. I nagged every highborn who visited our barracks on their highborn business. I pored over stamps on crates in the warehouse and the seals on every door, watched the commanders do paperwork and volunteered to help... That's how I learned, one step at a time. And then literacy became my ticket to a comfortable life!" {n}Jae sets back her shoulders, obviously very proud of herself.{/n}

Ich habe über den Stempeln auf Kisten im Lagerhaus gebrütet und den Siegeln auf sämtlichen Türen, habe den Commandern bei ihrem Papierkram zugesehen und angeboten, zu helfen ... So habe ich es gelernt, Schritt für Schritt. Und dann wurde das Lesen mein Ticket zu einem komfortablen Leben!" {n}Jae richtet sich stolz auf.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Ah, savoir lire et écrire... Voilà deux capacités que je bénis autant que je les maudis. Je harcelais tous les bien-nés qui venaient dans notre caserne pour affaires. J'étudiais les étiquettes sur les caisses de l'entrepôt et les sceaux de chaque porte, j'observais les commandants pendant qu'ils remplissaient leurs formulaires et je me proposais de les aider... C'est comme ça que j'ai appris, petit à petit, et c'est ce qui m'a ouvert la porte d'une vie meilleure ! » {n}Jae se redresse en bombant le torse, visiblement très fière d'elle-même.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah, literacy! My blessing and my curse. I nagged every highborn who visited our barracks on their highborn business. I pored over stamps on crates in the warehouse and the seals on every door, watched the commanders do paperwork and volunteered to help... That's how I learned, one step at a time. And then literacy became my ticket to a comfortable life!" {n}Jae sets back her shoulders, obviously very proud of herself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ah, savoir lire et écrire... Voilà deux capacités que je bénis autant que je les maudis. Je harcelais tous les bien-nés qui venaient dans notre caserne pour affaires. J'étudiais les étiquettes sur les caisses de l'entrepôt et les sceaux de chaque porte, j'observais les commandants pendant qu'ils remplissaient leurs formulaires et je me proposais de les aider... C'est comme ça que j'ai appris, petit à petit, et c'est ce qui m'a ouvert la porte d'une vie meilleure ! » {n}Jae se redresse en bombant le torse, visiblement très fière d'elle-même.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ah, okuryazarlık! Hem nimetim hem de lanetim. Soylu işleri nedeniyle kışlamızı ziyaret eden her soylunun başına ekşirdim. Depodaki kasalara yapıştırılan pulları, kapıların üzerindeki mühürleri incelerdim. Komutanlar evrak işlerini yaparken izler, yardım etmeye gönüllü olurdum. Öyle öğrendim yani, adım adım. Derken okuryazarlık, konforlu bir yaşama geçiş biletim oldu!" {n}Jae, omuzlarını geriye atıyor. Kendiyle gurur duyduğu çok belli.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah, literacy! My blessing and my curse. I nagged every highborn who visited our barracks on their highborn business. I pored over stamps on crates in the warehouse and the seals on every door, watched the commanders do paperwork and volunteered to help... That's how I learned, one step at a time. And then literacy became my ticket to a comfortable life!" {n}Jae sets back her shoulders, obviously very proud of herself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ah, okuryazarlık! Hem şansım hem de şanssızlığım. Soylu meseleleri nedeniyle koğuşumuzu ziyaret eden her soylunun başının etini yedim. Depodaki sandıkların üzerindeki pulları ve kapıların üzerindeki mühürleri inceledim, komutanlar evrak işlerini yaparken izledim ve yardım etmeye gönüllü oldum. Öyle öğrendim yani, adım adım. Okuryazarlık da ondan sonra benim konforlu bir yaşama gidiş biletim oldu!" {n}Jae göğsünü kabartıyor, kendiyle gurur duyduğu çok belli.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
